TweetsbyHour.map: function(doc){function parseTwitterDate(text){return new Date(Date.parse(text.replace(/( +)/, ' UTC$1')));}var tweetdate=parseTwitterDate(doc.created_at);var seconds = tweetdate.getSeconds();var minutes = tweetdate.getMinutes();var hour = tweetdate.getHours();if(tweetdate && doc.sentiment){emit(hour,1)}}
